item.description:
We're playing on Russell Field on Wednesday.

Directions to Russell here .

By Car:
Russell Field has a parking lot, which is the first left off of Rindge Ave after you turn off of the Alewife Brook Parkway.

By T:
Red Line to Alewife stop. Inside the Alewife station there are signs to the Russell Field exit. You will then walk outside onto a bike path. Russell Field is directly on the left.

Cleats are ALLOWED on Russell Field.


Here's the game plan:

  • 8:00 - Toss the disc around, meet folks, be merry
  • 8:15 - Overview of the rules, safety, etc - then divide into teams 
  • 8:30 - Play!!!!!!
  • 10:00 - Conclude the meetup with snacks and socializing


Here's what we humbly ask of you (works great as a checklist):

  • Dress for the weather
  • Bring a white t-shirt and a colored t-shirt
  • Arrive on time to be guaranteed a spot in a game
  • RSVP is recommended so you can be notified if the game is canceled
  • Bring WATER!
  • If you are a regular, please consider bringing a buck for the Frisbee Fund

As usual, we will supply the frisbees, cones, lanyards, first aid supplies (hopefully will never be used) and our pretty smiles. As we periodically mention, all these supplies are paid out-of-pocket by your loving Frisbee organizers and everyone has been so generous with their donations to-date. Thank you and let's keep the dream alive!
item.name: Wednesday Night Time Ultimate @ Russell Field
